projects.title: Tootle
projects.description: This is a single page ui built using Bootstrap. All parts are responsive and working here.

projects.title: VIDEO HUB
projects.description: This is a video streaming app built using Chakra UI. This website has a dark-mode and catchy user interface.

projects.title: XCrypto
projects.description: This is a crypto fetching app built by ReactJS and an external crypto API. One can find current exchanges and crypto prices using this amazing project. I also added a graph to see what is going on with the long term.

projects.title: REACT CART
projects.description: This is a simple but fully functional cart ui built by ReactJS. It is a small part of an ecommerce web-app. I have managed different states using Redux Toolkit.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: This is my personal portfolio and I have made it using ReactJs, Firebase, React motion and Sass. It can be helpful to see what is my current level.

projects.title: Vocab Boost
projects.description: This is my first typescript project. I have built it using React TS, microsoft translator API and a text-to-speech API.
